name: Snapshot (itch) (Gameheads)
description:
SnapShot is a visual novel game where you, the player,  will hang out with your cast of friends, explore different places in the city, and take pictures of events that happen during your hangouts with each friend!

Press Space Bar= Start/Continue Dialouge 

P= Phone

I= Inventory 

C=Camera

Backspace= Pause 

Left Click Choices 

Touchpad/ mouse = Cursor control 

Merry Bay by Ghostrifter Official | https://soundcloud.com/ghostrifter-official 

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
